name: Elyse Inferrera
location: Rancho Palos Verdes, California, United States
occupation: UFL Game Day Entertainment and Fan Experience Consultant
education: Bachelor's degree in Business Management and Sports Management, Marymount California University (2014 - 2017)

experience.position: UFL Game Day Entertainment and Fan Experience Consultant
experience.description: Organize, advance, and execute game days for all 8 markets in the league and produce special events beyond normal game operations: Draft, Town Halls, playoffs, and Championship. Create all game scripts in ShoFlo and create/deliver time sheets to Broadcast, Football Ops, and league staff. Oversee the game day, operations crew, and stage managers, including scheduling, event confirmations, and payroll. Manage all sponsorship inventory and ensure accurate execution and all markets relating to videos, signage, and graphics.

Organize and facilitate in-stadium production and events. Work directly with show producer to ensure pre-game and half-time events are properly executed.

Outside LAFC Events:
- MLS All Star Game 2021
- CONCACAF Championship 2023
- Copa Angelina 2022 & 2023
- Leagues Cup 2023

Organize, advance and execute various events including overseeing load in, event day, and load out. Develop budgets and account for all expenses involved with each production. Create Production Timelines, manage vendor relationships, and act as liaison between client and building operations crews. Strategically plan overall event constructs including multimedia elements, guest pathways and experience, timelines, and execution goals to ensure the fundamental success of events in conjunction with client goals.

Notable Events:
- Lakers Events
- Drone Racing League
- BETX

Produce and assist with various events, including Special Olympics World Games 2023, Hollywood movie premieres, billboards, music events, award shows, red carpet events, unified cup, NFL parties, award show after parties, and more.

Organize and facilitate all in-stadium production and events related to Angel City football games. Manage pregame celebrations, halftime shows, activations, post-game celebrations, and sponsorship activations. Collaborate directly with the Show Caller to ensure all game elements are properly executed and league rules are followed in the stadium.
Managed COVID-19 compliance protocols for events and productions, ensuring safety measures were met and maintained.

Collaborated with Gucci Special Events and Client Advisor teams to create unique Gucci Experiences in Los Angeles and Dallas. Transformed venues into “Gucci Spaces” generating over $14 million in sales. Managed vendors and assisted with budget management alongside the Gucci finance team.

experience.position: Production Manager - LOUIS VUITTON MENS FASHION SHOW 2021
experience.description: Collaborated with senior producers and the Artistic Director to execute production needs. Created and maintained production schedules, coordinated with vendors, distributed production schedules and daily call sheets, and supervised production assistants.

- Organized and facilitated in-arena production and events, acting as a liaison between STAPLES Center and the LA Kings.
- Produced and called all games, ensuring promotions were accurately executed.
- Directed on-ice activities and ceremonies.
- Wrote game scripts in ShoFlo and managed timing sheets for the NHL.
- Oversaw GameDay Operations Crew and Stage Managers, including scheduling and event confirmations.
- Managed in-game sponsorship inventory.
- Stage managed special events beyond normal game operations, such as Bob Miller’s retirement ceremony, Festival, and Paint the Ice.
- Set up fan engagement activations like Fan Fests and Season Ticket Member Events.
- Managed Events Department inventory, including props, PA Systems, and photo activations.

- Managed vendors in fan-facing areas.
- Coordinated special game appearances of Charger Girls and the Thunderbolts on the field.
- Produced Christmas parties and Training Camp productions.

experience.position: Soft Good Department Manager and Inventory Tech
experience.description:
- Managed all aspects of the Soft Goods Inventory.
- Prepared and received rental orders for various entertainment industry jobs.
- Tracked rental inventory, including missing or sold items.
- Facilitated orders and requests between clients, sales representatives, and manufacturers.
- Manufactured soft goods using an industrial sewing machine.

- Special Olympics World Game 2023 - Berlin: Served as a producer, scriptwriter, stage manager, and production manager for various events and parties, including Golisano Awards, Founders Reception, Round Table, and Opening and Closing ceremonies.
- Lakers Special Events: Served as Associate Producer for events like Kobe Bryant’s statue unveiling, Elgin Baylor statue unveiling, Kobe’s Jersey Retirement, and Lakers Friends and Family Holiday Party.
- BETX Experience - Production Coordinator (June 2016, 2017, 2018): Assisted with event coordination, managed load in and strike, liaised between BET, AEG, and Los Angeles Convention Center, managed vendor and talent relationships, and oversaw guest experience aspects.
- NBA ALL STAR GAME 2018: Organized aspects with Turner Broadcasting's live events team, managed artist green rooms, assisted with talent movement, and managed production element installations related to TBN spaces.

bio: Experienced Game Entertainment Manager and Producer with a demonstrated history of working in the Sports and Entertainment Industry. Skilled in event planning, time management, event management, and Public Relations. Strong professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Business Management and Sports Management from Marymount California University.
